metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Websites often display content in multiple columns (like a magazine or a newspaper).
content.html: Websites often display content in multiple columns (like a magazine or a newspaper).

content.code_html:
Cities

  • London
  • Paris
  • Tokyo

London

London is the capital city of England. It is the most populous city in the United Kingdom, with a metropolitan area of over 13 million inhabitants.

Standing on the River Thames, London has been a major settlement for two millennia, its history going back to its founding by the Romans, who named it Londinium.

Footer

content.text: HTML has several semantic elements that define the different parts of a web page:
content.html: HTML has several semantic elements that define the different parts of a web page:

content.text: You can read more about semantic elements in our HTML Semantics chapter.
content.html: You can read more about semantic elements in our HTML Semantics chapter.

content.text: There are four different techniques to create multicolumn layouts. Each technique has its pros and cons:
content.html: There are four different techniques to create multicolumn layouts. Each technique has its pros and cons:

content.text: If you want to create your layout fast, you can use a CSS framework, like W3.CSS or Bootstrap .
content.html: If you want to create your layout fast, you can use a CSS framework, like W3.CSS or Bootstrap.

content.text: Ever heard about W3Schools Spaces ? Here you can create your website from scratch or use a template, and host it for free.
content.html: Ever heard about W3Schools Spaces? Here you can create your website from scratch or use a template, and host it for free.

content.text: It is common to do entire web layouts using the CSS float property. Float is easy to learn - you just need to remember how the float and clear properties work. Disadvantages: Floating elements are tied to the document flow, which may harm the flexibility. Learn more about float in our CSS Float and Clear chapter.
content.html: It is common to do entire web layouts using the CSS float property. Float is easy to learn - you just need to remember how the float and clear properties work. Disadvantages: Floating elements are tied to the document flow, which may harm the flexibility. Learn more about float in our CSS Float and Clear chapter.

London is the capital city of England. It is the most populous city in the United Kingdom, with a metropolitan area of over 13 million inhabitants.

content.text: Use of flexbox ensures that elements behave predictably when the page layout must accommodate different screen sizes and different display devices.
content.html: Use of flexbox ensures that elements behave predictably when the page layout must accommodate different screen sizes and different display devices.

content.text: Learn more about flexbox in our CSS Flexbox chapter.
content.html: Learn more about flexbox in our CSS Flexbox chapter.

content.text: The CSS Grid Layout Module offers a grid-based layout system, with rows and columns, making it easier to design web pages without having to use floats and positioning.
content.html: The CSS Grid Layout Module offers a grid-based layout system, with rows and columns, making it easier to design web pages without having to use floats and positioning.

content.text: Learn more about CSS grids in our CSS Grid Intro chapter.
content.html: Learn more about CSS grids in our CSS Grid Intro chapter.
